Package mhaldar.shapes

Class Line

java.lang.Object
mhaldar.shapes.Shape
mhaldar.shapes.Line
public class Line extends Shape
Author:
Mira Haldar This class creates a Line object w/ double precision.

  • Constructor Details

    • Line

      public Line​(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
      intializes a line with the following coordinates
      Parameters:
      x1 - the x-coordinate of the first point
      y1 - the y-coordinate of the first point
      x2 - the x-coordinate of the second point
      y2 - the y-coordinate of the second point

  • Method Details

    • constructLineAngle

      public Line constructLineAngle​(double x, double y, double angle, double length)
      constructs a line with different parameters in the constructor
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the first point
      y - the y-coordinate of the first point
      angle - the angle of the line in degrees (0 is horizontal right)
      length - the length of the Line
      Returns:
      Line the new line

    • setPoint2

      public void setPoint2​(double x2, double y2)
      Sets this line’s second point (x2, y2) to a new coordinate
      Parameters:
      x2 - x-coordinate of the given point
      y2 - y-coordinate of the given point

    • getIntersectionX

      public double getIntersectionX​(Shape other)
      Returns the x coordinate of the intersection point of this line and the other line (assuming they continue forever)
      Parameters:
      other - Line to find intersection with
      Returns:
      x-coordinate of intersection, NaN if collinear

    • getIntersectionY

      public double getIntersectionY​(Shape other)
      Returns the y coordinate of the intersection point of this line and the other line (assuming they continue forever)
      Parameters:
      other - Line to find intersection with
      Returns:
      y-coordinate of intersection, NaN if collinear
